title: Episode 169: New Year's Grazing Board
description:
As 2021 comes to a close, we wanted to bring you a grazing board of some of our favorite segments we regularly release on our Patreon. This is all brand new content, never heard before. Up first, a True Crime Headline featuring an update on the Ellen Greenberg case. Then, a case for Judge Christie, and Santa is on trial. Finally, we round it out by discussing several possible assholes. We hope you enjoy and have a very Happy - and Creepy - New Year!


Please consider supporting the companies that support us!
-Visit oliveandjune.com/CREEPY and use code CREEPY for 20% off your first Mani System! This is an exclusive offer you can ONLY get here!
-Receive 35% off your first order at sundaysfordogs.com/CREEPY or use code CREEPY at checkout
-Charlotte's Web - Go to charlottesweb.com and use code CREEPY at checkout to save 15% on your order. Get started with the OG CBD brand who kicked off this whole CBD craze. This code works on all CBD products besides bulk bundles
